item.title: GoldenDict OCR · 划词设置
item.description:
[Optical Character Recognition, GoldenDict Professional, OCR, Linux, macOS, Windows, Apple's Vision framework, WinRT, Windows.Media.Ocr, Tesseract, Nicomsoft, 箐典, 取词, 划词翻译]
